mapper.select: select p.product_name, c.cart_id, c.product_id, p.product_price, p.product_info, c.total_product_count, c.total_product_price, b.brand_name, m.member_num from product p, cart c, member m, brand b where p.product_id = c.product_id and b.brand_num = p.brand_num and m.member_num = c.member_num and c.member_num = #{memberNum} order by cart_id desc
